meanings.definition: The unicameral national legislature of Israel.
meanings.sent1: The knesset passed a new law yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Members of the knesset gather to discuss important issues.
meanings.sent3: The knesset meeting turned into a lively debate about the best falafel in town.
meanings.sent4: In the knesset of opinions, hers stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The walls of the knesset echoed with passionate speeches.

meanings.sent1: Let's have a knesset to plan the school fundraiser.
meanings.sent2: The annual knesset of the book club is always well-attended.
meanings.sent3: The knesset of animals in the park was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a knesset of candles.
meanings.sent5: The knesset of clouds gathered ominously in the sky.
